text: sihamte prthiraita bhramana karaa na'i neki, tetiyahe sihamte dekha palehemtena sihamtara purbararti bilakara parainama kenekuraa haichila? Sihamte prthiraita ihamtatakaiyo sankhyagaraistha arau sakti o kirtita achila ati prabala. Tathapi'o sihamte yi arjana karaichila seya sihamtara kono kamata aha nachila
